title: looks like my account is now located in EUW ( i'm from oceania) [help]
body:
Hello ?

is it only me or i'm playing now from EUW i was an Oceania player

and now it's like the region of my account changed,  cause i can see friends from EUW playing lol

replies.body:
As part of the update to Riot accounts, you can have people on your friends list from other regions, without transferring or being on the same region as them. From the look of it, your account is still an OCE account, which means you should still be able to log onto and play on the OCE server.

If that's not working, i'd recommend you submit a ticket to [Support](https://support-leagueoflegends.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and see if they can figure out what's happening.
